entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Oakville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:23 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 9:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: 2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: 0.5°C
Wind: NNW 33 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow mixed with rain late this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 9:29 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:29 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Overcast. Low minus 8.
